name: Waiting For You
description:
DEVLOG COMING HERE SOON

 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjHNkH_KPvvHCwZEo22EzSg/

Source Code

https://github.com/N-8-D-e-v/Waiting-For-You

You hear rumors of gold hidden among the abandoned house on Malvado Court, and go check it out to see for yourself. You wonder why nobody else has tried before you....

CONTROLS

GOAL- collect all 10 pieces of gold before he finds you...

Left click to use your flashlight (make sure to turn it off every so often as it will run out of battery (shown in the upper left-hand corner)

WASD or Arrows to move

Right click to place a marker

E to interact with the computer

Arrows to cycle through security cameras while using the computer

C to crouch

Run into gold to collect it

ESC to quit
